column2: The striped skin of a great tiger hunted down and slain by [GetTitledFirstName] after a long and perilous journey.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was instructed in the Inca ways of weaving. She has no great talent.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was instructed in the Inca ways of weaving. She is a natural.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was instructed in the Inca ways of weaving. She is a true prodigy - nobody can make textiles as well as she can.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was taught the secret of making the Inca maize beer.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman learned how to make delicious maize bread, for religious or nutritious purposes.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman developed a most charming singing voice.
In the Acllahuasi, this woman was trained in Incan ritual and celebratory dances.
This woman is the highest possible class of Aclla. She is destined to be sacrificed to the gods.
This woman belongs to the second-highest class of Aclla, and she can only wed the Sapa Inca.
This woman is part of the third class of the Aclla, and has been offered as a wife to one of the Sapa Inca's vassals.
This woman turned out not to be a very impressive Aclla, and she has been made a servant to one of the Sapa Inca's vassals.
This young woman is being indoctrinated and sedated in preparation for her imminent sacrfice.
Recently requested support as Grand Chancellor
This character is required to be a Loyalist at the moment.
This character is required to be a Pragmatist at the moment.
This character is required to be a Glory Hound at the moment.
This character is required to be a Zealot at the moment.
This character is required to be a Loyalist at the moment.
Powerful elements at the court of [This.GetBestName] are currently contesting each other for more influence.
The [This.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven's court is currently experiencing interesting times.
This character recently requested additional influence at [This.GetHerHis] liege's court.
[This.GetBestName] is currently attempting to deal with powerful elements at court... permanently...
An influential eunuch recently requested additional influence at the [This.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven's court.
Recently approached by the Grand Chancellor
The Grand Chancellor recently requested additional influence at the [This.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven's court.
An influential courtier recently requested additional influence at the [This.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven's court.
An influential vassal recently requested additional influence at the [This.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven's court.
This ruler recently considered drastic options for dealing with troublesom elements at court.
The Yulin Guard has been raised to crush those foolish enough to oppose the Dragon Throne.
The Longwu Guard has been raised to crush those foolish enough to oppose the Dragon Throne.

A dragon has made its lair in this province
This province was recently set ablaze. Nothing but ashes remain.
The Dragon Throne recently held [This.GetBestName] up as an example for all.
Various Hwarang-led patrols are present here, deterring bandits, rebellious peasants, and the like.
This character is not currently interested in joining the Hwarang.
This character has used their standing within the Hwarang to discourage their vassals from joining any factions.
This character is currently trying to become a better member of the Hwarang.
This character recently reflected on their traits.
Making love is not always exhausting...
This character is feeling a bit exhausted at the moment...
The towns and villages in this province were extensively decorated in preparation for the hanami celebrations
This woman is most unfit to hold her current office, and should ideally be replaced by a suitable member of the Imperial Family
Pirate raids might begin in this province
Due to a failed attempt to end the Permanent Regency this ruler is unable to govern at present.
This ruler's Permanent Regent has recently gained or lost power.
This ruler's Permanent Regent has forced them into secluded meditation for the time being, completely preventing any interference in government affairs.
This character was recently forced off their liege's council
Recently searched for a Court Mu
Only a fool would doubt [This.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven.
Few would doubt [This.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven.
[This.GetBestName] claims to possess the Mandate of Heaven. The truth of this claim is unverified.
Few would believe [This.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven.
Only a fool would believe [This.GetBestName]'s claim to possess the Mandate of Heaven. May [This.GetSheHe] live in interesting times.
Of late, people have become more concerned that [This.GetBestName] might not possess the Mandate of Heaven.
OF late, people have become more convinced that [This.GetBestName] might possess the Mandate of Heaven.

This character has interpreted their holy texts to gain insight into the workings of interpersonal relations and diplomacy.
This character has interpreted their holy texts to gain insight into the workings of strategy and the art of commanding an army.
This character has interpreted their holy texts to gain insight into the workings of finance and administration.
This character has interpreted their holy texts to gain insight into the workings of subterfuge and seduction.
This character has interpreted their holy texts to gain insight into the workings of their faith and the world around them.
By refusing to mourn [This.GetHerHis] ancestor, [This.GetBestName] has gone against the norms of [This.GetHerHis] society and is appropriately shunned for it.
[This.GetBestName] is living in a shack next to the grave of [This.GetHerHis] ancestor to show [This.GetHerHis] devotion and filial piety.
[This.GetBestName] has cut back on excess and is eating only simple foods while mourning [This.GetHerHis] ancestor.
[This.GetBestName] is not wearing appropriate clothes for mourning, something that [This.GetHerHis] family is unlikely to take kindly to.
[This.GetBestName] is abstaining from all sexual activity while mourning to show [This.GetHerHis] devotion to [This.GetHerHis] deceased ancestor.
[This.GetBestName]'s relatives are quite upset over [This.GetHerHis] decision to not yet mourn [This.GetHerHis] ancestors.
Various promiment Confucians are quite upset over [This.GetHerHis] decision to not yet mourn [This.GetHerHis] ancestors.
[This.GetBestName]'s vassals are quite upset over [This.GetHerHis] decision to not yet mourn [This.GetHerHis] ancestors.
[This.GetBestName] has failed to mourn [This.GetHerHis] ancestors, which is neither right nor proper.
